data.title: “Septembers of Shiraz” release date
data.meta_description: "Septembers of Shiraz" with Adrien Brody and Salma Hayek, premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival on September 15, 2015.   New posters and stills:     (Photo credit: IMDb and @ AdrienBrody俱乐部 on weibo)
data.text:
Succession / 2021 / Status: Filming / Season: 3 / Episodes: 1 / Role: Josh Aaronson

– The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

– Josh Aaronson, a billionaire activist investor who becomes pivotal in the battle for the ownership of Waystar.

The Salamander Lives Twice / (N/A) / Status: Pre-Production / Role: N/A

– Adrien Brody and Vera Farmiga will headline director Ant Timpson’s mystery thriller The Salamander Lives Twice.

– Written by Toby Harvard, with a story by Timpson and Harvard, the pic follows an injured man (Brody) with an impenetrable briefcase and no memory who is found on the shoreline of a remote island by Iris and her daughter Goggy (Farmiga), the last remaining members of a once prosperous family dynasty.

Site name: Adrien Brody Fansite

Open Since: February 6, 2015

Domain: adrienbrodyfansite.wordpress.com

Founder: Lissa

Admins: Lissa, Fabi

Contact: brodyfansite@gmail.com

» AdrienBrodyFansite is an unofficial supporting website dedicated to the actor and artist Adrien Brody. This website is run by fans for fans. We are not associated with Adrien, his management, co-workers or family members.

All pictures and other media are copyright to their original and respective owners and are used for entertainment only. This site is non-profit and no copyright infringement is intended. If you want any context removed from the site, feel free to contact me.

This fansite is strictly against any paparazzi or stalkerazzi pictures. We will not support any kind of bashing or privacy intrusion into Adrien’s life and/or the one of people around him.

It is public knowledge that Mr. Adrien Brody is a very kind person with his fans. Always giving good examples and giving excellent opinions in the interviews, so his fans admire him a lot. But he is a person who does not publish much in his social networks, he not expose much his daily life because he like privacy. For these reason we respect his private and intimate life and we not post any gossip or rumors on private life matters, photos while he walking the streets or while he doing personal activities.

The gallery contains just paparazzi photos related to Adrien’s work, such as on-set photos and promotional related (arriving or leaving TV Shows, on filming set, behind scenes, public events, etc).

We are here to support Adrien through his career. His personal life is his own business… and his fans we are very happy with his way of behaving.
